AttributeType.name: filespec
AttributeType.description: File specification. Can include wildcard characters ? and *

AttributeType.name: path
AttributeType.description: Path to a file. The path can include environment variables or values extracted from registry keys.

AttributeType.name: recursive
AttributeType.description: Is path specified recursive or limited to the directory that is specified.

AttributeType.name: alternatePath
AttributeType.description: For New Targets, the alternate path to which the file specification should be restored to

AttributeType.name: logicalPath
AttributeType.description: Logical path for a Writer component. This logical name uses backslash as separators to form a logical namespace hierarchy

AttributeType.name: componentName
AttributeType.description: Name used to identify a Writer component. May be qualified by a logical path.

AttributeType.name: instanceName
AttributeType.description: If multiple instances of a writer are running, they must all have instance names. In this case, the instance name can be used to specify which writer instance should receive restore events for a particular component.

AttributeType.name: backupOptions
AttributeType.description: BETest can use this attribute to send a writer-specific string for each component being backed up

AttributeType.name: restoreOptions
AttributeType.description: BETest can use this attribute to send a writer-specific string for each component being restored

AttributeType.name: authoritativeRestore
AttributeType.description: BETest can use this attribute to specify that a component should be restored in an authoritative manner

AttributeType.name: rollForwardType
AttributeType.description: This attributes determines how far a writer should roll forward restored data or not.

AttributeType.name: rollForwardPoint
AttributeType.description: This attributes determines how far a writer should roll forward restored data or not.

AttributeType.name: restoreName
AttributeType.description: This attribute allows a requestor to rename a component at restore time.

AttributeType.name: additionalRestores
AttributeType.description: Indicates whether additional restores of this component should be expected.

AttributeType.name: writerId
AttributeType.description: Unique id to identify the writer. Note that this identifies the writer class rather than a specific instance of the writer.

ElementType.name: Writer
ElementType.description: Information about a writer that is to be backed up/restored

ElementType.name: Component
ElementType.description: Information about a component that is to be backed up/restored

ElementType.name: SubComponent
ElementType.description: Indicates that BETest is not to restore the root component. Rather BETest is to restore the list of selectable-for-restore components.

ElementType.name: NewTarget
ElementType.description: Indicates that BETest is to restore the specified file specification to an alternate location.
